# Publishers.Autoconnect

**Class**

A publisher that automatically connects to an upstream connectable publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
class Autoconnect<Upstream> where Upstream : ConnectablePublisher
```

## Overview

This publisher calls [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ConnectablePublisher/connect()] on the upstream [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ConnectablePublisher] when first attached to by a subscriber.

## Creating an autoconnect publisher

- **init(upstream:)**: Creates a publisher that automatically connects to an upstream connectable publisher.

## Declaring supporting types

- **Publishers.Autoconnect.Output**: The kind of values published by this publisher.
- **Publishers.Autoconnect.Failure**: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

## Inspecting publisher properties

- **upstream**: The publisher from which this publisher receives elements.

## Using explicit publisher connections

- **Publishers.MakeConnectable**: A publisher that provides explicit connectability to another publisher.

## Conforms To

- Publisher
